瘜字的基本解释

瘜
xī
〔瘜肉〕古同“息肉”，因黏膜发育异常而形成的像肉质的突起物。

瘜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》相即切，入職，心。］
息肉。参见“瘜肉”。

瘜字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页777第35
【唐韻】相卽切【集韻】悉卽切，?音息。【說文】寄肉。【廣韻】惡肉。【方書】鼻肬曰瘜肉，亦謂之瘜菌，鼻通息，故从息。【聖濟總錄】咽生瘜肉，先刺破，令血出，用鹽豉和搗塗之，效。

瘜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瘜字的起名意思

暂无。

瘜
Basic explanation of words
瘜
xī
〔Populus〕 In ancient times, the same "polyp" is a fleshy protrusion formed due to abnormal mucosal development.
瘜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" interlinks, entry, heart. ]
polyp. See "pockety".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　瘜; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 777 35
[Tang Yun] Cut with each other [Ji Yun] Cut with each other, sound. [Said the text] Send meat. 【Guangyun】Evil meat. [Fangshu] Nasal obstruction is called spleen, which is also called spleen bacteria. The nose relieves the breath, so it's from the breath. 【Records of St. Francis】The pharynx produces spleen, first pierce it to make the blood flow out, and then use salted soy sauce and pound it to make it effective.
